name: Fliff
description:
Think you know who will win today’s big game? Prove it by making your picks in Fliff!

Fliff is a new predictive gaming experience for sports fans everywhere. Play with Coins to compete against the Fliff community, move up the leaderboards, unlock rewards and achieve GOAT status. Use Fliff Cash to participate in our sweepstakes* to win real CASH prizes.

Win or lose, Fliff has rewards for all sports fans! Coins and Fliff Cash are available to claim for FREE so you can get in on the action anytime.

Note: The Fliff app is not designed to take advantage of the large iPad screen.

*The sweepstakes accessible via the Fliff app is solely sponsored and administered by Fliff Inc. Apple is not a sponsor of, affiliated with, or responsible for conducting, the sweepstakes.
